title: Unable To connect to chat

replies.body: I am having this problem as well, ive done all of these things and it still doesnt work! Please Help!
please don't just bury this thread rito, we need answers!

hey i am having an issue with logging into chat https://gyazo.com/a3dc77b2e4372c27f90babbfde3630b4 im not sure if this is a bug or not but i've tried restarting so many times on my pc and on my client aswell if you can fix it for me that would be really great!

Hiya! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
im having the same problem, and its very annoying when i want to play. im on mac btw
I am having the same issue. it started around 1:55 am
I am having this problem also, Mine started at the exact same time roughly, 1:50ish this AM. Hoped when I woke up it would be fixed, but nope.. Wtf is going on :(

I am having the same issues as well.

Launcher version: 0.38.0.181
LOL Patch 6.4

Performed a file scan, changed my date, rebooted several times, doesn't appear to be on my end.
Seems to be spreading to more of the environment.  Time to work on the chat servers ,sounds like the famous reboot, reboot, reboot should fix it.

What is interesting is the status servers show everything is Green, but where is the Chat Client Connectivity in the status window?


Thanks for taking a look Support. :)

My friend & I have had the same issue "Unable to connect to chat" since 03/03/2016 3:47:00 Pm (15:47:00)(Mountain time-zone)
We have also gone through the ancient forums for our problems (attempts unsuccessful), Search for files to fix the error (no luck), even removing the game and re-downloading it in hopes of it functioning again (another attempt unsuccessful)
hopefully a admin does see this thread and helps resolve our problem and future players as well :)
Dammit I'm having this as well
Having the same problem as well. Tried to add it to my firewall inbound and outbound however still is not working. Will try to run as administrator to see if it fixes it.
i have same problem and tried all those things still nothing
